megabyte.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a unit for measuring computer information, equal to 1,024 kilobytes, and used less exactly to mean one million  bytes
megabyte.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a million BYTEs (=units of computer information, each holding one number or letter), used to talk about the amount of processing space on a computer
megabyte.translation[1].definitions[0].e: a floppy disk that holds 4 megabytes of data
